program.heading: Your 4-Week Journey

weeks.title: Week 1: Breaking Fear
classes: Class 1: Break the ice, short intros, English-only safe space (1hr)
Class 2: Think in English, daily conversations, survival phrases (1hr)

weeks.title: Week 2: Building Comfort
classes: Class 3: Hold conversations, ask follow-ups, pair speaking (2hrs)
Class 4: Express opinions, describe people/places, get comfortable with discomfort (2hrs)

weeks.title: Week 3: Real-World Expression
classes: Class 5: Tell simple stories, personal experiences (2hrs)
Class 6: Friendly debates, speak under pressure (1hr)

weeks.title: Week 5: Confidence
classes: Class 9: Real-life scenarios - interviews, dating, sales (1hr)
Class 10: Final speaking challenge, reflection, celebration (2hrs)

questions.q: I'm very shy. Will I be forced to speak?
questions.a: Yes‚Äîbut gently. We use a buddy system and warm-up sessions to ease you in. Everyone speaks, but we start small (30-60 seconds). The whole point is to get comfortable being uncomfortable.

questions.q: What if I make a lot of mistakes?
questions.a: Perfect! That's exactly the point. We celebrate mistakes. You'll never improve if you don't try and fail. This is a judgment-free zone.
No. This program focuses on casual and semi-casual conversational English. If you need exam prep, this isn't the right fit.

questions.q: Do I need to be fluent already?
questions.a: No, but you should be able to read and understand basic English. If you can read this website, you're ready.

questions.q: What if I miss a class?
questions.a: We'll provide recordings, but live participation is critical. If you miss more than 2 classes, you won't get the full benefit.
If you attend Class 1 and feel this isn't for you, we'll refund 100%. After that, no refunds‚Äîbecause we'll have reserved your spot.

questions.q: Can I join if I'm outside Dhaka?
questions.a: Yes! Classes are online (except the 1 physical meetup, which is optional).

questions.q: What level of English will I reach?
questions.a: You won't become fluent in 4 weeks. But you WILL be able to hold 10-15 minute conversations without freezing, express your opinions, and feel confident in casual settings.

finalCta.heading: Stop Waiting. Start Speaking.
finalCta.line2: It's time to actually speak it.
